level.text: Upon completion of the PCA Service Authorization, DHCF or its designated agent shall make a referral to the beneficiary’s choice of a qualified Provider.
A referral to a qualified Provider shall not be considered complete unless it includes all of the following:
A copy of the physician’s order for PCA services issued in accordance with Section 5006;
A copy of the completed written assessment of the beneficiary undertaken in accordance with Section 5003.3; and
A copy of the completed PCA Service Authorization issued in accordance with Section 5003.4.
